plot: Women discuss about the different types of violence they suffered as lesbians. They explain how they have resisted the preconceived ideas and discrimination becoming militants of the Brazilian Lesbian Movement.
title: Histórias Lésbicas

plot_en: Women discuss about the different types of violence they suffered as lesbians. They explain how they have resisted the preconceived ideas and discrimination becoming militants of the Brazilian Lesbian Movement.
